Title: Root out the Hu Feng counter-revolutionary clique exhibition cartoons
Designer: Wang Zhongqing (王仲清)Mi Gu (米谷)Jiang Fan (江帆)Lü Xi'an (吕西安)Wu Yun (吴耘)Zhou Yuequan (周月泉)Zhou Lushi (周路石)Hong Huang (洪荒)Ying Tao (英韜)Shi Mingde (施明德)Te Wei (特伟)Chen Jinyan (陈今言)Tao Mouji (陶谋基)Ye Qianyu (叶浅予)Zhao Wenwei (赵文渭)Zhao Yannian (赵延年)Le Xiaoying (乐小英)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: This is the opening sheet of a set of 20 cartoon posters, published during the anti-Hu Feng movement. Seventeen cartoonists contributed. Unfortunately, the designers cannot be linked to most of the individual cartoons.
